description:
8.42 aphaser
Add a phasing effect to the input audio.

A phaser filter creates series of peaks and troughs in the frequency spectrum.
The position of the peaks and troughs are modulated so that they vary over time, creating a sweeping effect.

A description of the accepted parameters follows.
name: aphaser

parameters.description: Set modulation speed in Hz. Default is 0.5.
parameters.name: speed

parameters.description:
Set modulation type. Default is triangular.

It accepts the following values:

‘triangular, t’
‘sinusoidal, s’
parameters.name: type

source:
8.42 aphaser

Add a phasing effect to the input audio.

A phaser filter creates series of peaks and troughs in the frequency spectrum. The position of the peaks and troughs are modulated so that they vary over time, creating a sweeping effect.

A description of the accepted parameters follows.

in_gain

Set input gain. Default is 0.4.

out_gain

Set output gain. Default is 0.74

delay

Set delay in milliseconds. Default is 3.0.

decay

Set decay. Default is 0.4.

speed

Set modulation speed in Hz. Default is 0.5.

type

Set modulation type. Default is triangular.

It accepts the following values:

‘triangular, t’
‘sinusoidal, s’
